name: King of the Graveyard
description:
Break the curse of your family's bad reputation in the Universe. Gather all the energy cells, kill the zombies in your way and become the 'King of the Graveyard'. Make your family proud.

How to play?

Movement            WASD

Run                           Shift

Jump                        Space

Shoot                       Mouse 0

Zoom                       Mouse 1

Weapons               Wheel scroll or 1   2   3

Credits:

Thank you Kenney for your great assets.

Thank you to the artists from "The Ultimate Game Music Collection" for the music.

To the player...

Thank you for playing my game. I hope you enjoy it.

Created for the Kenney's Game Jam 2020
